commit.message:
configure.in: Allow building in $srcdir.

* configure.in: Allow building in $srcdir.
* configure: Regenerated.

From-SVN: r52347

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2002-04-15  DJ Delorie  <dj@redhat.com>
+
+	* configure.in: Allow building in $srcdir.
+	* configure: Regenerated.
+
 2002-04-14  Mark Wielaard <mark@klomp.org>
 
 	* java/net/natPlainDatagramSocketImpl.cc (close): Set timeout to 0.
